Ovo sučelje Vam može pomoći razumjeti kako zviždač koristi nod. Prezentiramo Vam predaje koje se trenutno nalaze na nodu i nekoliko statistika o vrsti upotrebe (aktivnost, datoteke, komentari).

This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: Ova platforma koristi GlobaLeaks softver koji je posebno dizajniran da zaštiti identitet osobe koja predaje dojavu i primatelja u razmjeni procurenih materijala.

To enable it, his public key must be loa: Da biste omogućili, njegov javni ključ mora biti učitan od strane administratora ili primatelja.
To ensure your anonymity be sure that yo:
To ensure your anonymity be sure that you are visiting this site using the Tor Browser Bundle.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.
To know more about GlobaLeaks Security y: To know more about GlobaLeaks Security you can read the following document:
To learn more you should read the securi: To learn more you should read the security in a box manual for practical security best practices:
To properly organize your initiative, pl: To properly organize your initiative, please read the following guidelines:
To report a bug or request a feature in: To report a bug or request a feature in GlobaLeaks software, please open a ticket describing the issue you're encountering or the new feature request:
To support GlobaLeaks, you can provide a: To support GlobaLeaks, you can provide a small financial donation;
Use the 16 digit key code to login and s: Use the 16 digit key code to login and see any messages we'll send you or if you think of anything else you should have added.
Visit the security in a box website: Visit the security in a box website
We were not able to determine if you are: Nismo bili u mogućnosti odrediti da li ste anonimni ili ne, molimo nastavite pažljivo
We will try to get back to you as soon a: We will try to get back to you as soon as possible!
Welcome to GlobaLeaks Administration Int: Dobro došli na GlobaLeaks administratorsko sučelje
What is the topic of your whistleblowing: Što je tema Vaše zviždačke inicijative
When the option is re-enabled the spoole: Neposlana e-pošta će se nakupiti kada se opcija ponovo omogući.
Which of the following statements is tru: Koja od sljedećih izjava je istinita?
Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: Zviždači mogu predavati predaje putem Tor2weba.
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing yourself to the risks that someone else will know that you have submitted something, without knowing what you have submitted.

Instead with an Anonymous Submission you are fully protected, it is not possible for a third party to know that you have submitted something nor what you have submitted.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

To make an Anonymous Submission, instead of using your usual Web Browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.) you should use the Tor Browser Bundle. This is a special piece of software designed to enable Anonymous Web Browsing.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send you encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: Svjesni ste povezanih rizika, idite dalje, smatrajte se upozorenim.
You are connecting to the node without a: Povezujete se s nodom neanonimno, a ovaj nod podržava samo anonimne predaje
You are receiving this email because you: You are receiving this email because you should look into this to determine if the cause is malicious or not.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: You are strongly advised to visit this site using the desktop app called Tor Browser, that protects your identity.
You are strongly suggested to use the To: You are strongly suggested to use the Tor Browser, unless you know what you are doing.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat via IRC on OFTC server on channel #globaleaks:
You have finished configuring your Globa: Završili ste konfiguraciju Vaše GlobaLeaks stranice. Od sada je i ubuduće možete prilagođavati unutar administratorskog sučelja.
You have not configured your encryption: Niste podesili svoje ključeve enkripcije pa će se datoteke pohranjivati na GlobaLeaks nod nešifrirane.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the GlobaLeaks nodes you are subscribed to or upload a new key.
You've reached the maximum number of dow: Dostigli ste maksimalni broj preuzimanja za ovu datoteku
Your node is not configured! Please use: Vaš nod nije konfiguriran! Molimo, nastavite putem
Your user has reached the maximum number: Vaš korisnik je dosegao maksimalan broj pristupa za ovu dojavu
can be configured to deliver encrypted e: može se konfigurirati prema redoslijedu da bi dostavili šifriranu e-poštu i pohranili šifrirane podatke. Morate kopirati i zalijepiti ascii verziju vašeg ključa, a zatim ćete moći ažurirati svoje postavke enkripcije. Ako imate bilo kakve dvojbe, kontaktirajte svog administratora.
it will help us improve GlobaLeaks, maki: it will help us improve GlobaLeaks, making the world a better place to stay!
